1.title: The Homecoming
1.plot: Naib Subedar Sartaaj Singh and Squadron Leader Imaan Khan, return to India after being held captive for 17 years by the Pakistani Army after the Kargil War.

2.title: The Grand Welcome
2.plot: Harpal Singh celebrates the return of his son, Sartaj. Imaan's family too welcomes him. Later, Vikram Singh's head suggests that Sartaj and Imaan be awarded for their bravery.

3.title: Missing!
3.plot: Sartaj returns home but will it be good beginnings for him and Harleen? Meanwhile, Imaan goes missing. Later, Vikram visits Imaan.

4.title: Debriefing or Interrogation
4.plot: Vikram begins interrogating Imaan and Sartaj. The two P.O.Ws recount their nightmares in Pakistani jails. Later, Vikram refuses to release the two, even as their wives, Nazneen and Harleen, wait to take them home.

5.title: The Heroes
5.plot: The P.O.Ws are nominated for the gallantry awards. The next day, their families feel proud of the two as they are honored by the Defence Minister but not all looks good as Vikram spots something unusual in their behavior.

6.title: The Song
6.plot: Vikram tells Duggal about the code, Imaan and Sartaj are using to communicate with each other. Later, celebrations begin at Imaan's house.

7.title: The Meeting
7.plot: Imaan asks Salim for advice on connecting better with his daughter, Shaira. Meanwhile, Sartaj carries a drunk Harleen to bed. Vikram goes to Ayaan's college to meet someone to decode the POWs' conversation.

8.title: The Pain
8.plot: Imaan is invited as a special guest on Nazneen's cooking show. Meanwhile, Mrs. Awasthi agrees to decode the Morse code in exchange for money. While Sartaj's family has a fun day at the mall, Nazneen sees the torture marks on Imaan's body and tries to deal with her conflict.

9.title: The Decoding
9.plot: Sartaj and Imaan try to get back to normal life. While Sartaj finds himself a job in the regiment, Imaan learns about the latest technology from his son, Ayaan. Meanwhile, Mrs. Awasthi learns about a certain Lala. Who is he?

10.title: The Mystery Man
10.plot: Harleen is excited about Sartaj's return, but he is unhappy at work. Meanwhile, Shaira hatches a plan to bring Nazneen and Salim back together. Later, Imaan tells Sartaj about Lala's whereabouts.

11.title: The Big Lead!
11.plot: Sartaj learns that he has been duped by Satish. When an officer insults Sartaj, Harleen stands up for him. Imaan, Nazneen, Salim and Payal go on a double date set up by Shaira. Vikram and Duggal finally figure out who Lala is.

12.title: The Mission
12.plot: Nazneen tries to deal with Shaira pressurizing her to reveal her and Salim's relationship to Imaan. Meanwhile, Vikram gets unofficial funds for a covert mission from Duggal.

13.title: The Stalker!
13.plot: Imaan is being followed by an unknown person. When Sartaj comes to know about a marriage proposal for Harleen, he humiliates her. Meanwhile, Imaan visits his mother's house, where all his childhood memories rush back to him.

14.title: A Pakistani Agent?
14.plot: Salim requests Imaan to not interfere in his personal life. Elsewhere, Sartaj assaults Satish. Meanwhile, Vikram receives information about Imaan from his intelligence officer.

15.title: The Arrest
15.plot: Sartaj gets arrested for assaulting Satish. Will his jail memories hound him? After meeting with an accident, Shaira makes a request to Imaan.

16.title: The Hoax Phone Call
16.plot: Imaan reminds Sartaj about their past in prison. Duggal tells Vikram about Ayaan's hoax call about a bomb in a college. The agents take Ayaan to Vikram.

17.title: The Informer
17.plot: Imaan decides to stay at Sartaj's house for the Gurpurab festival. Meanwhile, Vikram assures Duggal that Imaan's son, Ayaan has agreed to work for them and will come up with some information. Soon enough, he does.

18.title: The Real Picture
18.plot: Indira seeks permission from the Singh family before filming a documentary on Sartaj's life. Meanwhile, Vikram has a task for Ayaan. Will Ayaan go against his father?

19.title: The Painful Memories
19.plot: While Imaan makes a suggestion to Nazneen for Shaira's birthday, Sartaj agrees to share his experience during his years of captivity in Pakistan for the documentary. Meanwhile, Vikram has a task for Ayaan. Will Ayaan agree to do it?

20.title: The Trail of Evidence
20.plot: Vikram and his agents search Imaan's house for evidence and clues. They manage to transfer the data from Imaan's computer. Has Vikram got what he was looking for?

21.title: The Investigation Continues
21.plot: Duggal instructs Vikram to gather the intel on Sartaj and Imaan as soon as possible in order to continue their unofficial operation.

22.title: The Revelation
22.plot: Duggal confronts Vikram for installing the microphone in Imaan's house. Nazneen slaps Shaira. Later, Vikram requests Ayaan to reset the microphone. Will Ayaan reveal the truth to Imaan?

23.title: Mission Implausible?
23.plot: Imaan attacks Vikram for using Ayaan against him. Later, Duggal asks Vikram to stop the operation. Will he?

24.title: The Secret Agent
24.plot: IB agent Kirti visits Vikram to update him about their secret mission. Meanwhile, there is some good news for Sartaj.

25.title: The Reconciliation
25.plot: Indira tries to win Sartaj's trust. Shaira reconciles with Imaan and the Khans celebrate her birthday. Nazneen and Imaan decide to marry again. Later, Imaan is shocked to see Dr Nandni Kapoor.

26.title: The Confession Letter
26.plot: Imaan recalls the time spent with Sartaj in the prison cell. He remembers writing a confession letter to Nazneen before the Kargil war.

27.title: The Hidden Truth
27.plot: Imaan tries to tell Nazneen about Nandini. How will Nazneen react? Even Salim has a role to play in covering up for Imaan. Meanwhile, Sartaj gifts a box of mangoes to Indira.

28.title: The Trap
28.plot: Mr Sodhi gives the documents of the petrol pump to Sartaj. Later, Indira makes her next move to lure Sartaj to her.

29.title: The Betrayal
29.plot: Salim asks Imaan to forget his past and start afresh. Indira succeeds in her plan as Satpal sees her kissing Sartaj. Satpal requests Sartaj not to cheat on Harleen. Is Sartaj ready to face the consequences?

30.title: The Heartbreak
30.plot: Imaan and Nazneen's wedding preparations are underway. Meanwhile, Salim replaces Imaan's confession letter. Harleen learns about Sartaj's affair with Indira.

31.title: The Rejection
31.plot: Harleen requests Indira to leave the house. Sartaj refuses to accept Harleen as his wife and decides to leave.

32.title: The Missing Letter
32.plot: The Khans celebrate Imaan and Nazneen's sangeet ceremony. Later, Salim tells Imaan that his confession letter is missing. Where is it?

33.title: The Truth!
33.plot: Sartaj requests Harleen not to leave the house. Meanwhile, Salim destroys Imaan's letter. Later, Imaan is stunned to discover that his mother is aware of his confession.

34.title: The Lie!
34.plot: Imaan becomes speechless when he learns about Nazneen and Salim. He holds himself responsible for the situation and tells a lie to Naz.

35.title: The Separation
35.plot: A heartbroken Nazneen confronts Salim for hiding the confession letter. Meanwhile, Sartaj's decision to leave the house shatters Harleen.

36.title: The Suspicion
36.plot: Harleen and Nazneen decide to move on with their lives. Later, Kirti is caught lying and Sartaj starts suspecting her. Will he find out about Vikram?

37.title: The Divorce
37.plot: After much contemplation, Nazneen demands for a divorce from Imaan. Coincidentally, Sartaj too requests a broken Harleen to sign their divorce papers before his departure from the house.

38.title: Missing in Action
38.plot: Sartaj and Imaan's respective families visit the Ministry of Defence 17 years ago, inquiring about their whereabouts, to which the government responds with a 'missing in action' report.

39.title: The Broken Nest
39.plot: Harleen agrees to sign the divorce papers, but demands to meet Indira before she does so. Meanwhile, Imaan reminisces the past and bids goodbye to his family before resentfully leaving the house.

40.title: The Responsibility
40.plot: Harleen asks Sartaj to take up the responsibilities. Meanwhile, Imaan tells Salim that he has left home.

41.title: The Phone Call
41.plot: A dejected Nazneen confronts Sartaj for deceiving Harleen, while he tries to prove Imaan's innocence to her. Later, Imaan is shocked to receive a call from Lala.

42.title: The Threat!
42.plot: Imaan makes Nazneen realize her love for Salim, while Satpal asks Sartaj to take up the responsibility of his family. Later, Lala threatens Imaan to follow his orders.

43.title: The Planned Accident
43.plot: Salim is admitted to the hospital after an accident. The doctors inform Imaan and Nazneen about his critical condition. Imaan tells Sartaj that the accident was planned and informs him about the threat call from Pakistan.

44.title: The Instructions
44.plot: Vikram tells Imaan that Salim's accident was pre-planned. He tells Nazneen that he suspects Imaan and Sartaj's motives. Later, Imaan agrees to follow Lala's instructions.

45.title: The Spy!
45.plot: Lala asks Imaan to open a bank account in an international bank. Imaan is shocked to learn that Lala is tracking him, while Vikram spies on Imaan. Later, Sartaj informs the family that they are in danger.

46.title: The Promise
46.plot: Imaan lies to Nazneen about the bank account and the money deposited in it. Lala assures Imaan that their phone calls cannot be tapped or traced. Later, Vikram asks Kirti to spy on Imaan.

47.title: The Conspiracy!
47.plot: Vikram and Kirti discuss about Imaan and Sartaj's connection with Lala. Later, Lala instructs Imaan to park a car loaded with explosives outside the NSA office.

48.title: The Car!
48.plot: Vikram suspects Imaan and asks Kirti to follow him. Meanwhile, Lala instructs Imaan to enter the NSA office with the explosive-laden car.

49.title: The Bouquet!
49.plot: Harleen goes to check on Sartaj. Later, her car breaks down on the way. Imaan enters NSA and offers a bouquet to Duggal. Will he leave the explosives at the NSA?

50.title: The Fatal Injury
50.plot: While Imaan is relieved when the doctor tells him that Salim's surgery turned out to be successful, Sartaj sets out to rescue Harleen. Will Salim get well or succumb to his injuries?

51.title: The Condolence Meet
51.plot: The Khans mourn Salim's death. Shaira and Ayaan are dejected on recalling the moments they spent with Salim. Later, Sartaj and Satpal visit the Khans.

52.title: The Suspect
52.plot: The Khans perform Salim's last rites. Vikram tries to track Sartaj and Imaan's activities. He suspects Sartaj and asks Kirti to spy on him. Later, Sartaj receives a threat note.

53.title: The Disclosure
53.plot: Sartaj refuses to take police protection for the family and asks Indira to leave the house. Later, he tells Imaan that he has planted the RDX at NSC on Lala's instructions.

54.title: The Fallout
54.plot: When Imaan confronts Sartaj for planting the RDX at NSA, the latter attacks him to stop him from meeting Vikram. Later, Sartaj reveals how he had to follow Lala's instructions. Will they take Vikram's help?

55.title: The Bomb!
55.plot: Imaan and Sartaj reveal to Vikram about planting the RDX at the NSA. Kirti attacks Lala's associates, while Duggal learns about the bomb. Can Vikram defuse it?

56.title: The Rescue Mission
56.plot: Vikram refuses to allow Sartaj and Imaan to accompany him to the spot where the bomb is planted. Meanwhile, the bomb squad reaches NSA to defuse the bomb. Will they defuse it in time?

57.title: Kirti's Identity Revealed
57.plot: Imaan and Vikram suspect Lala of having hidden the bomb somewhere else. Later, Kirti shoots Lala's associate and reveals her real identity to the Singhs.

58.title: The Search
58.plot: Avi tells Imaan that he had delivered the bag to a person at the nursery. Later, Vikram learns that the bomb is hidden in a tree and informs this to the defence minister. Will he be able to locate the bomb?

59.title: Under Control
59.plot: Vikram finds the plant containing the bomb and replaces it, while the bomb squad successfully defuse the bomb. Later, Vikram lies to the defence minister about Imaan and Sartaj.

60.title: The Confession
60.plot: After returning home, Imaan and Sartaj tell their wives about the torture they had to face in the Pakistani prison. Later, they confess to Vikram that Sartaj had to kill Lt. Siddhant Thakur to save Imaan.

61.title: The Past
61.plot: Imaan and Sartaj tell Vikram how they met Siddhant. Later, Sartaj confesses to Vikram of killing Siddhant to save his and Imaan's life.

62.title: The Memories
62.plot: Shobha refuses to believe that Siddhant is dead. She recalls memories of how Siddhant had brought her closer to Vikram. Later, she expresses her desire to meet Imaan and Sartaj.

63.title: The Tribute
63.plot: Shobha fumes at Sartaj and Imaan when she meets them. Later, they recall their past with Siddhant and carry out his last rites.

64.title: The Saviour
64.plot: Lala rescues a severely injured Siddhant and takes care of him. While the others have doubts about Siddhant, Lala is adamant. What will Siddhant's decision be?

65.title: The Turning Point
65.plot: Tormented by Sartaj's rejection and Hussain's death, will Siddhant join Lala's terrorist group and betray his own country?

66.title: The Successor
66.plot: Lala chooses Siddhant aka Sadiq to carry forward his responsibilities. The unhappy members of his council suggest that he appoint Yousuf as their leader, instead. What will Lala decide?

67.title: The Parting
67.plot: Sartaj apologizes to Harleen for his mistake. Meanwhile, Imaan and Nazneen sign the divorce papers.

68.title: Operation Badshah
68.plot: Sadiq asks his associates to activate the sleeper cells and initiate Operation Badshah. Meanwhile, Shobha offers a job to Imaan in her NGO.

69.title: The Informer
69.plot: Yousuf assaults a shepherd for passing information to the Indian military. However, an enraged Sadiq takes a more violent route.

70.title: The Dead Body
70.plot: Sadiq's associates throw the shepherd's dead body across the L.O.C. Arjun asks Sartaj to show Harleen her favorite film to win her back. Imaan shares his experience during his captivity with a support group.

71.title: The Execution
71.plot: Vikram refuses to become the National Security Advisor. Meanwhile, Lala asks Sadiq to launch Operation Badshah. Later, Duggal shows Vikram the Taviz found on the shepherd's corpse.

72.title: The Union
72.plot: The Khans attend the inauguration of the Singhs' petrol pump. Sartaj asks Harleen to inaugurate the station. Later, he shares his feelings with Harleen and destroys the divorce paper.

73.title: The Undertaking
73.plot: Sadiq informs the council members about his plan to abduct Rishi and Om Thadani. Later, Vikram tells Imaan about the Morse code and suspects that Siddhant is still alive.

74.title: The Deliverance
74.plot: Vikram informs Govind that Siddhant possibly needs their help. Later, Govind asks Duggal and Vikram to make a plan to rescue Siddhant.

75.title: The Visa
75.plot: Imaan refuses to allow Nazneen to go to the literature festival in Karachi. Meanwhile, Nazneen is shocked to see her approved permit for the fest.

76.title: The Mole!
76.plot: Vikram tells Imaan and Nazneen that he needs a mole who can contact Siddhant on their behalf. Yousuf gets injured in a bomb blast.

77.title: The Accusation
77.plot: Yousuf accuses Sadiq of planning the bomb blast. Meanwhile, Vikram tries to convince Nazneen to visit Karachi. Will Nazneen change her decision?

78.title: The Confrontation
78.plot: Imaan confronts Vikram for convincing Nazneen to work as a mole. Afreen decides to take Lala to Karachi to admit him to the hospital.

79.title: The Contact
79.plot: Afreen admits Lala to the hospital in Karachi. Meanwhile, Vikram tells Nazneen that Siddhant might try to contact her and asks her to destroy the evidence.

80.title: The Hidden Message
80.plot: Yousuf informs Sadiq and Lala about his plan to kill Nazneen. Later, Nazneen tells Imaan, Vikram and Sartaj about a chit she has found in a capsule.

81.title: The Presence
81.plot: Vikram tells Duggal about Siddhant's message. Nazneen informs Imaan that Siddhant didn't come to the art gallery. Later, she is stunned to see him in her hotel room.

82.title: The Attack
82.plot: Siddhant kills Yousuf's associate and informs Vikram about his plan. Meanwhile, Yousuf and his men open fire in the hotel and search for Nazneen.

83.title: The Obligation
83.plot: While Siddhant wishes to kill Lala, Nazneen boards the flight and waits for him. After learning Afreen's truth, will Siddhant betray her to return to India?

84.title: The Run
84.plot: Siddhant escapes after murdering Lala. Vikram and Sartaj try to save him from being tracked by Yousuf. Will Siddhant triumph in this dangerous endeavor?

85.title: The Good Soldier
85.plot: Vikram thanks Nazneen for helping them to save Siddhant. Later, Vikram apologizes to Siddhant for his mistake during the Kargil war.

86.title: The Unprecedented Return
86.plot: Siddhant's return leaves Shobha speechless. She feels uncomfortable when Siddhant agrees to attend the press conference organized for his felicitation.

87.title: The Gallantry Award
87.plot: Siddhant is awarded Seva Padak for his bravery. He shares crucial details about the training that takes place at LOC.

88.title: The Celebration
88.plot: The Singhs organize a party for Siddhant's victory. Later, they find another reason to celebrate.

89.title: The Deception!
89.plot: Afreen learns from Lala's last message that Sadiq did not murder Lala. Later, Sartaj begins to suspect Siddhant.

90.title: The Breaking News
90.plot: Afreen manages to retrieve the memory card, while Siddhant reads a shocking news. Yousuf is adamant on accomplishing Operation Badshah.

91.title: Memories Haunt
91.plot: Avi is released. Shaira takes care of his security. Meanwhile, memories haunt Siddhant when he meets Rohan.

92.title: The Promotion
92.plot: Vikram is appointed the new National Security Advisor of India. Meanwhile, the doctor has good news for Harleen.

93.title: The Revenge
93.plot: Yousuf learns that Afreen is pregnant. Meanwhile, Shaira is determined to kill Avi. Can Nazneen and Ayaan stop her from committing this crime?

94.title: The Strike
94.plot: Imaan suspects Siddhant when he sees him in the mosque. Later, he learns about the surgical strike by the Indian army with Lieutenant Siddhant Thakur as the primary informant.

95.title: The Job
95.plot: Siddhant is appointed as the security-in-charge of the famous industrialist, Mr. Thadani. Later, Siddhant has a talk with Afreen.

96.title: The Seeds of Doubt
96.plot: Siddhant catches Imaan looking for clues in his room. What is Siddhant hiding?

97.title: The Tail!
97.plot: Secret investigation team is made to look on the actions of siddhant by vikram singh after his talk with imaam and sartaaj.

98.title: The Connection
98.plot: Vikram, Imaan and Sartaj get closer to figure out Siddhant's true identity. Will Vikram crack the connection?

99.title: The Discovery
99.plot: Vikram discovers a compelling evidence against Siddhant and calls for an emergency maneuver. Meanwhile, Yousuf manages to locate Afreen.

100.title: The Hunt
100.plot: Vikram sets out to trace Ibrahim Sheikh to find out Siddhant's plan. Meanwhile, the preparations for Operation Badshah are underway.

101.title: The Operation Begins!
101.plot: Sadiq initiates Operation Badshah. What demands does he have in store for the National Defence Council?

102.title: The Demand
102.plot: The video conferencing begins. Explaining the motive behind his actions to Vikram, Siddhant wants his demands to be met in 30 minutes. Will India accept it?

103.title: The Onslaught
103.plot: A shooter murders Yusuf. Meanwhile, Siddhant demands 10 million dollars from the Indian government.

104.title: The Motive
104.plot: Afreen is overwhelmed to see Hussain alive. Meanwhile, Siddhant's true motive for Operation Badshah is revealed.

105.title: The Infiltration
105.plot: Imaan requests permission for a SWAT team attack on Sadiq and his men. Meanwhile, Sartaj infiltrates the terrorists in the hospital.

106.title: The Trigger
106.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

107.title: The Dawning
107.plot: Sadiq demands a live satellite link after failing in his mission. He gets into a video call with Afreen, and his mistake finally dawns on him. Meanwhile, Imaan and his team set out to catch Sadiq.

108.title: The Award
108.plot: Three months later, Vikram recalls the moment when the POWs had returned to India. Harleen receives Sartaj's posthumous award for his bravery.

109.title: A True Serviceman
109.plot: Vikram reminisces various situations in which Imaan helped him and recollects some things which haunt him about Imaan. Later, Imaan receives an award for all his contributions.

110.title: The Afterglow
110.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: P.O.W. Bandi Yuddh Ke
plot: After spending 17 years in captivity, two soldiers, who share a dark secret, return to their families. The two families try to pick up from where they left off, while a government agent tries to expose their secret.
